topic: Ongoing public inquiry into the Southport attack and its devastating impact.
evaluation: The core cluster of articles details the ongoing public inquiry into the Southport attack, focusing on testimonies from victims, parents, witnesses, and details regarding the attacker, Axel Rudakubana. These articles are highly relevant, developmental, and chronologically track the inquiry's proceedings from early September to late September 2025. Article 'uk-news/2025/sep/12/stephen-lawrence-mother-doreen-plea-witnesses-review' was identified as noise due to its complete irrelevance to the Southport attack inquiry, discussing the Stephen Lawrence murder review instead.
